metadata.title: Present Progressive Tense - What's Happening Now
metadata.subject: English - Grammar

scenes.title: Actions Happening Right Now
scenes.narration_text: Hello everyone! Today we'll learn about the Present Progressive Tense. This tense helps us talk about actions that are happening right now, at this very moment. It's like taking a photo of what someone is doing!
scenes.visual_prompt: Animated classroom with children doing various activities - one reading, one writing, one drawing. A camera icon 'captures' each action.

scenes.title: The Formula
scenes.narration_text: The Present Progressive Tense has a simple formula: We use 'am', 'is', or 'are', then add the verb with 'ing' at the end. For example: I am playing. She is reading. They are dancing. Let's see how it works!
scenes.visual_prompt: Colorful formula board showing: 'am/is/are + verb + ing' with building blocks. Each word is a colorful block that fits together.

scenes.title: I am studying
scenes.narration_text: Let's start with 'I'. When I talk about myself, I use 'am'. Right now, I am studying in Grade 6. I am learning grammar. I am having fun! See how we add 'ing' to the verbs: study becomes studying, learn becomes learning!
scenes.visual_prompt: A cheerful student at a desk with books. Speech bubbles show: 'I am studying', 'I am learning', 'I am having fun'. The 'ing' endings are highlighted in bright colors.

scenes.title: She is reading
scenes.narration_text: When we talk about one person, like 'he', 'she', or 'it', we use 'is'. Look: My friend is reading a story book. The teacher is writing on the board. The cat is sleeping on the mat. All happening right now!
scenes.visual_prompt: Three panels showing: 1) Girl reading a book, 2) Teacher writing on board, 3) Cat sleeping. Each has 'is + verb-ing' labeled clearly.

scenes.title: We are playing
scenes.narration_text: For 'we', 'you', and 'they', we use 'are'. Listen to these: We are playing a board game. You are listening to this lesson. They are running in the park. All these actions are happening right now!
scenes.visual_prompt: Three scenes: 1) Group of children playing board game, 2) Students with headphones listening, 3) Kids running in park. Each labeled with 'are + verb-ing'.

scenes.title: Practice Makes Perfect
scenes.narration_text: Excellent work! Now you know the Present Progressive Tense. Remember: Use 'am' with I, 'is' with he/she/it, and 'are' with we/you/they. Then add 'ing' to the verb. Now you can describe what's happening around you right now!
scenes.visual_prompt: Summary chart with three columns showing: 'I am playing', 'She is reading', 'They are dancing'. Happy children celebrating with thumbs up.
